import React from "react" export default function AlbumList(props){ const albumsMapped = props.albums.map((album, index)=>{ const normalStyle = { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row', wordWrap: 'break-word', border: '2px solid #CCCCCC', borderRadius: '10px', padding: '10px', marginBottom: '10px', maxWidth: '50vw', cursor: 'pointer', } const selectedStyle = {...normalStyle, border: "2px solid black"} return (
setSelectedAlbum(index)}>

{album.albumRating}/10

{album.albumName}

{album.albumArtist}

{album.albumReview}

)}) return albumsMapped; }
